marklogic.body: Honestly Raw and Nitro were #1 in my book. Each promotion had something great about it. WWF had Stone Cold, The Rock, Undertaker, Shawn Michaels Kane, Chris Jericho, etc. WCW had Goldberg, Sting, DDP, Hogan, Nash, Flair, etc. Both shows brought out the best in the other show. I truly feel Nitro would still be around to this day if Ted Turner wouldn't of merged with AOL. Jamie Kellner cancelled WCW programming Off of TNT and TBS even though Monday Night Nitro was still getting the highest rating for TNT.
